mapper.select: select qmngsndzjlid, to_char(jlrq,'yyyy-mm-dd')jlrq, hrmax, mapmax, sapmax, rrmax, tmax, jxtq, qmngshzid, gcs, crrt, xghxy, sjqsfsykjyw, kjywzl, sfwzxqmngs, wzxqmngsjg, jzqmngs, sfjzqmngs, jzqmngsjg, fswzxpy, wzxpyjg, jzpy, sfjzpy, jzpyjg, sftsport, tsportjg, sfgsy, gsyjg, sfgmsy, sfcmvpcr, cmvpcrjg, sfebvpcr, ebvpcrjg, qt1, sfqt1, xbct, ctjgms, ctjg, qt1jg, qt2jg, jldjt, jlry, qt3, sfqt3, qt3jg, qt2, sfqt2, lrry, lrsj, xgry, xgsj, scry, scsj, scbj, gmsyjg, sfzbwsw11, bfzs11, sfzbwsw12, bfzs12, sfzbwsw21, sfzbwsw22, sfzbwsw23, sfzbwsw24, jzpy2, jzpyjg2, jzpy3, jzpyjg3, qtjg, sjspyjgyx, sjsbblx, sjspyjg, jzpy4, jzpyjg4, to_char(sjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')sjsj, to_char(sjsj2,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')sjsj2, to_char(sjsj3,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')sjsj3, to_char(sjsj4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')sjsj4, to_char(jgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')jgsj, to_char(jgsj2,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')jgsj2, to_char(jgsj3,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')jgsj3, to_char(jgsj4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')jgsj4, grxglclxpd from crf_qmngsndzxxjl where scbj!='1' and qmngshzid=#{qmngshzid}

select qmngsndzjlid, jlrq, hrmax, mapmax, sapmax, rrmax, tmax, jxtq, qmngshzid, gcs, crrt, xghxy, sjqsfsykjyw, kjywzl, sfwzxqmngs, wzxqmngsjg, jzqmngs, sfjzqmngs, jzqmngsjg, fswzxpy, wzxpyjg, jzpy, sfjzpy, jzpyjg, sftsport, tsportjg, sfgsy, gsyjg, sfgmsy, sfcmvpcr, cmvpcrjg, sfebvpcr, ebvpcrjg, qt1, sfqt1, xbct, ctjgms, ctjg, qt1jg, qt2jg, jldjt, jlry, qt3, sfqt3, qt3jg, qt2, sfqt2, lrry, lrsj, xgry, xgsj, scry, scsj, scbj, grxglclxpd, gmsyjg from crf_qmngsndzxxjl where scbj!='1' and qmngsndzjlid=#{qmngsndzjlid}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO crf_qmngsndzxxjl ( qmngsndzjlid, hrmax, mapmax, sapmax, rrmax, tmax, jxtq, qmngshzid, gcs, crrt, xghxy, sjqsfsykjyw, kjywzl, sfwzxqmngs, wzxqmngsjg, jzqmngs, sfjzqmngs, jzqmngsjg, fswzxpy, wzxpyjg, jzpy, sfjzpy, jzpyjg, sftsport, tsportjg, sfgsy, gsyjg, sfgmsy, sfcmvpcr, cmvpcrjg, sfebvpcr, ebvpcrjg, qt1, sfqt1, xbct, ctjgms, ctjg, qt1jg, qt2jg, jldjt,
jlrq,
qt3, sfqt3, qt3jg, qt2, sfqt2, lrry, lrsj, scbj, gmsyjg, sfzbwsw11, bfzs11, sfzbwsw12, bfzs12, sfzbwsw21, sfzbwsw22, sfzbwsw23, sfzbwsw24, jzpy2, jzpyjg2, jzpy3, jzpyjg3, qtjg, sjspyjgyx, sjsbblx, sjspyjg, jzpy4, grxglclxpd,
sjsj,
sjsj2,
sjsj3,
sjsj4,
jgsj,
jgsj2,
jgsj3,
jgsj4,
jzpyjg4 ) VALUES ( #{qmngsndzjlid}, #{hrmax}, #{mapmax}, #{sapmax}, #{rrmax}, #{tmax}, #{jxtq}, #{qmngshzid}, #{gcs}, #{crrt}, #{xghxy}, #{sjqsfsykjyw}, #{kjywzl}, #{sfwzxqmngs}, #{wzxqmngsjg}, #{jzqmngs}, #{sfjzqmngs}, #{jzqmngsjg}, #{fswzxpy}, #{wzxpyjg}, #{jzpy}, #{sfjzpy}, #{jzpyjg}, #{sftsport}, #{tsportjg}, #{sfgsy}, #{gsyjg}, #{sfgmsy}, #{sfcmvpcr}, #{cmvpcrjg}, #{sfebvpcr}, #{ebvpcrjg}, #{qt1}, #{sfqt1}, #{xbct}, #{ctjgms}, #{ctjg}, #{qt1jg}, #{qt2jg}, #{jldjt},
cast(#{jlrq} as timestamp),
#{qt3}, #{sfqt3}, #{qt3jg}, #{qt2}, #{sfqt2}, #{lrry}, LOCALTIMESTAMP, #{scbj}, #{gmsyjg}, #{sfzbwsw11}, #{bfzs11}, #{sfzbwsw12}, #{bfzs12}, #{sfzbwsw21}, #{sfzbwsw22}, #{sfzbwsw23}, #{sfzbwsw24}, #{jzpy2}, #{jzpyjg2}, #{jzpy3}, #{jzpyjg3}, #{qtjg}, #{sjspyjgyx}, #{sjsbblx}, #{sjspyjg}, #{jzpy4}, #{grxglclxpd},
cast(#{sjsj} as timestamp),
cast(#{sjsj2} as timestamp),
cast(#{sjsj3} as timestamp),
cast(#{sjsj4} as timestamp),
cast(#{jgsj} as timestamp),
cast(#{jgsj2} as timestamp),
cast(#{jgsj3} as timestamp),
cast(#{jgsj4} as timestamp),
#{jzpyjg4} );
mapper.update:

jlrq=cast(#{jlrq} as timestamp),
jlrq=null,
qt3 = #{qt3}, sfqt3 = #{sfqt3}, qt3jg = #{qt3jg}, qt2 = #{qt2}, sfqt2 = #{sfqt2}, xgry = #{xgry}, gmsyjg = #{gmsyjg}, sfzbwsw11 = #{sfzbwsw11}, bfzs11 = #{bfzs11}, sfzbwsw12 = #{sfzbwsw12}, bfzs12 = #{bfzs12}, sfzbwsw21 = #{sfzbwsw21}, sfzbwsw22 = #{sfzbwsw22}, sfzbwsw23 = #{sfzbwsw23}, sfzbwsw24 = #{sfzbwsw24}, jzpy2 = #{jzpy2}, jzpyjg2 = #{jzpyjg2}, jzpy3 = #{jzpy3}, jzpyjg3 = #{jzpyjg3}, qtjg = #{qtjg}, sjspyjgyx = #{sjspyjgyx}, sjsbblx = #{sjsbblx}, sjspyjg = #{sjspyjg}, jzpy4 = #{jzpy4}, jzpyjg4 = #{jzpyjg4},
sjsj=cast(#{sjsj} as timestamp),

jgsj3=null,
jgsj4=cast(#{jgsj4} as timestamp),
jgsj4=null,
xgsj = LOCALTIMESTAMP WHERE qmngsndzjlid = #{qmngsndzjlid};
UPDATE crf_qmngsndzxxjl SET scbj='1', scry = #{scry}, scsj = LOCALTIMESTAMP WHERE qmngsndzjlid = #{qmngsndzjlid};
UPDATE crf_qmngsndzxxjl SET scbj='1', scry = #{scry}, scsj = LOCALTIMESTAMP WHERE qmngshzid = #{qmngshzid};
mapper.select: select jl.qmngsndzjlid,to_char(jl.jlrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') as jlrq,jl.mapmax,jl.hrmax, grxg_jc.csmc grxglclxpd, jl.sapmax,jl.rrmax,jl.tmax,jl.qmngshzid,jl.gcs, case jl.jxtq when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end jxtq, case jl.crrt when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end crrt, case jl.xghxy when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end xghxy, case jl.sjqsfsykjyw when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sjqsfsykjyw, jl.kjywzl,jl.wzxqmngsjg,jl.jzqmngs,jl.jzqmngsjg,jl.wzxpyjg,jl.jzpy,jl.jzpyjg, jl.tsportjg,jl.gsyjg,jl.cmvpcrjg,jl.ebvpcrjg,jl.qt1,jl.ctjgms, jl.qt1jg,jl.gmsyjg,jl.jldjt,jl.jlry,jl.qt3,jl.qt3jg,jl.qt2,jl.qt2jg, case jl.sfwzxqmngs when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfwzxqmngs, case jl.sfjzqmngs when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfjzqmngs, case jl.fswzxpy when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end fswzxpy, case jl.sfjzpy when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfjzpy, case jl.sftsport when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sftsport, case jl.sfgsy when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfgsy, case jl.sfgmsy when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfgmsy, case jl.sfcmvpcr when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfcmvpcr, case jl.sfebvpcr when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfebvpcr, case jl.sfqt1 when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfqt1, case jl.xbct when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end xbct, case jl.sfqt3 when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfqt3, case jl.sfqt2 when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfqt2, case jl.sfzbwsw11 when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfzbwsw11, case jl.sfzbwsw12 when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfzbwsw12, case jl.xbct when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end xbct, case jl.sfzbwsw21 when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfzbwsw21, case jl.sfzbwsw22 when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfzbwsw22, case jl.sfzbwsw23 when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfzbwsw23, case jl.sfzbwsw24 when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sfzbwsw24, case jl.ctjg when '1' then '阴性' when '0' then '阳性' else '' end ctjg, case jl.sjspyjgyx when '1' then '是' when '0' then '否' else '' end sjspyjgyx ,sjsbblx,jl.sjspyjg,jl.bfzs12,jl.bfzs11,jl.jzpy2,jl.jzpyjg2,jl.jzpy3,jl.jzpyjg3,jl.jzpy4,jl.jzpyjg4, jl.sjsj,jl.jgsj,jl.sjsj2,jl.jgsj2,jl.sjsj3,jl.jgsj3,jl.sjsj4,jl.jgsj4 from crf_qmngsndzxxjl jl LEFT JOIN matridx_jcsj grxg_jc on grxg_jc.csid = jl.grxglclxpd where jl.qmngshzid=#{qmngshzid}
